title: RPG Interface Essentials - Map & Principal Menu
longDescription:
This is the third installment in our series, "RPG Interface Essentials - Map & Principal Menu" an essential collection of interface libraries designed especially for role-playing games. With a total of 121 sounds carefully distributed in various categories and subcategories, this installment will immerse you in a unique sound experience. From map sounds to sounds for key actions in the main menu, including opening and closing the skill tree and mission menu, every detail has been captured and edited at 96Hz, 24-bit, to give you the highest possible quality. .


Video Preview

Preview:


If you want to complement this library you can buy part 1 “Click Here”

If you want to complement this library you can buy part 2 “Click Here”


Featured Features:


  • Map Menu: Explore sounds ranging from fast travel and markers on the map to zooming in terrain, further immersing you in the atmosphere of the game.


  • Open & Close Pause Menu: Enjoy a distinctive sound when opening and closing the pause menu while you are immersed in the game.


  • Open & Close Quest Menu: Immerse yourself in the action with iconic sound by opening the quest menu, where players can explore, bookmark favorites, and more.


  • Open & Close Skill Tree: Experience the opening and closing of your character's skill tree with sounds that enhance the depth and customization of the experience.


  • Main Menu: Find a variety of sounds for generic buttons, such as the accept button, sounds to start the game, activate tutorials, and more, providing a complete sound interface.


Every sound in this collection has been meticulously recorded and edited to give you an exceptional listening experience. Discover "RPG Interface Essentials - Map & Main Menu" and elevate the sound quality of your RPG to new heights.



Exceptional Audio Quality:

  • With 121 sounds presented in 96 kHz and 24-bit, enjoy exceptional quality and clarity in every detail, immersing players in a captivating audio experience.

Designed for Versatility:

  • This versatile sound set is ready to enhance any gaming project, whether it's a classic RPG or a unique adventure.


More about the pack

  • Intuitive file naming
  • Use the sound effects over and over, in any of your projects or productions, forever without any additional fees or royalties. Use the SFX in your game, in your trailer, in a Kickstarter campaign, wherever you need to, as much as you want to.
  • Totally mono compatibility
  • All sounds have several variations.
  • Use your imagination and feel free to use any sound for other than the one described, remember that the world of sound is totally subjective.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 121 RPG Interface sounds
  • Number of Audio Waves/CUE: 121
  • Format: 96 Khz / 24 bits
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 2 minutes 35 seconds
  • Documentation
